name: Vinci
description: Vinci describes itself as a blockchain-based ecosystem of software services, such as decentralized data storage, bespoke security, and Python-written smart contract services. Priority is given to information security: the ecosystem employs algorithms to protect against threats like Sibylla, Eclipse Attack, and 51% Attack. Emphasis is placed on the systemâ€™s ability to integrate third-party blockchain solutions into the Vinci Ecosystem. This is done via an open API and a set of gateway interfaces that enable users to transact in all types of cryptocurrency.
